com.moomoohk.Mootilities.MooDownloader.gui

Class DownloaderShellPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.moomoohk.Mootilities.MooDownloader.gui.DownloaderShellPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class DownloaderShellPane
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Part of the Downloader GUI wrapper.
    Is used in the DownloaderShell class but can be implemented anywhere.
    Since:
    Dec 24, 2013
    Author:
    Meshulam Silk (moomoohk@ymail.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • DownloaderShellPane

        public DownloaderShellPane(DownloaderShell parent,
                           java.lang.String source,
                           java.lang.String destination,
                           boolean indeterminate)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        parent - Parent shell that contains this pane
        source - URL to remote file to download
        destination - Local filepath to download the remote file to
        indeterminate - True for an indeterminate download progress bar, false for a determinate bar

      • DownloaderShellPane

        public DownloaderShellPane(DownloaderShell parent,
                           java.lang.String source,
                           java.lang.String destination,
                           boolean indeterminate,
                           java.awt.Color color)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        parent - Parent shell that contains this pane
        source - URL to remote file to download
        destination - Local filepath to download the remote file to
        indeterminate - True for an indeterminate download progress bar, false for a determinate bar
        color - Color of progress bar
